DOC.detailed_description: For locally advanced nasopharyngeal carcinoma patient ( UICC7th stageIII IVb ) , investigator randomise assign either 3 cycle cisplatin plus 5-fluorouracil plus ( PF ) 3 cycle docetaxel plus cisplatin 5-fluorouracil ( TPF ) neoadjuvant chemotherapy . 21 day cycle . After neoadjuvant chemotherapy , patient receive intensity modulate radiotherapy ( IMRT ) 2 cycle concurrent chemotherapy cisplatin 80mg/m2 .
